38964.古びた ふたつの石が 並んで\n立てられている。: Two old stones stand side by side.

38965.古びた ふたつの石が\n夫婦のように 寄り添っている。\n<br>\nよく見ると:
Two old stones are leaning against each other like a married couple. If you look closely, you can see that there are faint words carved
on them. O maiden who gave her life for me. At least let her rest in peace.
